1402810.name: Sudoku3D Demo
1402810.description:
Sudoku puzzle - from easy to hardcore... Fully random generation with a choice of field size and difficulty.
  • Possibility to choose size from 3x3 to 9x9.
  • The choice of complexity from 1 to 9 (a certain analogue of the probability of an empty cell from 10% to 90%).
  • As the level of complexity increases, several solutions appear.
  • Since In this version of Sudoku there is a choice of size, the rule of small composite squares 3x3 as part of a full 9x9 does not actual.

Demo Version Limitations
  • Achievements and Leaderboards Are Disabled
  • Resizability and Difficulty Are Disabled
  • Autosave and autoload Are Disabled
